meanings.definition: The act of broadcasting a live event over the internet.
meanings.sent1: During the webcastings, people can watch events online.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching webcastings of concerts on my computer.
meanings.sent3: The webcastings of the school play made it easy for parents to see their kids perform.
meanings.sent4: Her webcastings of the cooking show were like inviting viewers into her kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The webcastings of the sports game felt as if I was right there in the stadium.

meanings.definition: A live transmission of audio or video content over the internet.
meanings.sent1: The webcastings of the radio show were clear and uninterrupted.
meanings.sent2: I prefer webcastings of news updates rather than waiting for TV broadcasts.
meanings.sent3: His webcastings of cat videos always bring a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: The webcastings of the podcast felt like a private conversation with the host.
meanings.sent5: The webcastings of the music festival captured the energy of the live performances.
